entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 6:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
